channel.title: [ADVICE] My Epic Platebody :] [ADVICE] ALSO [Possible Release]
channel.description:
k well i was browsn thru rsmv for a bit nd i came across r prtty nice looking pl8, maybe a fuller version of the torso iunno, but i messed round with it, added wings, some primitives and coloured it and i came with this: [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-04-16215648.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-04-16215632.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-04-16215620.png[/img]
Plz note, i take bout... erm... iunno... %25 credit? :S, for the recolour, lil bit of add ons etc, nd %70 for jagex, for the items and %5 for the epic tuts on mopar :],
//=====\\ Advice Time //=====\\
Now i was hoping to recieve some advice on what i should do, idc for harsh critism, this is my 2nd time using meta,other than the basic recolours(a robin for example), and i personally <3 this pl8.
{//==-==\\} Help Time {//==-==\\}
k well, ever since i started with meta, and recolouring i could never figure out how to animate something, so i was wondering if anyone could give me a quick tut on how to animate this pl8 and if possible capes, or a link to a tut, it would b the biggest help ever and if it works ill rep++ :D
++====++ Updates:D ++====++
[IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-04-16233129.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-04-16233055.png[/img] [IMG]http://i205.photobucket.com/albums/bb170/shadowfire38/09-04-16234029.png[/img]
Editted Shoulders, Wings Resized

item.title: [ADVICE] My Epic Platebody :] [ADVICE] ALSO [Possible Release]
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:48, topic:273904”][quote author=Mr. Craft link=topic=361939.msg2768598#msg2768598 date=1240968269]

Epic fail. how DARE you use the word epic for something so… bad… honestly:wings and recolors are WAY to old. do me a favor please: dont use the word ‘epic’ unless it truely is epic. id suggest starting out with swords. somethin simple

go talk to someone that cares? i can say w.e the fwk i want? if u got a prob start livin with it and get used to my vocab, my view is a totally opposite view of urs, ur fav pl8 u could ever model could b a pink plate with a unicorn on it for all we kno?

nd lol i can say epic as much as i feel like, im so epic that i deserve and epic reward for my epicly epicness and u epicly fail so bad ur an epic tragidy. gf?

wow. some1 cant handle a little critism. get the fuck off these forums. nobody enjoys your shit recolors. NOTHING that has to do with a jagex model could EVER be epic. Ofcourse you can use the word epic all you want, but everyone will be like "wow what a fag if he thinks thats epic he must have the mind of a 6 year old. heres an idea: grab a shovel, hire some1 to help u dig a hole, jump in and tell him to bury you. some1 who uses “epic” as much as you must be a 4foot10 kid with 2 inch thick glasses. tell me: how often does ur mom abandon u at a bus stop?

lmfao wow it takes a no life to say shit like that, actin tough behind a cp gj nerd. nd fyi dont pick a fight u cant win cause u kno deep inside ur shitty life u kno u have no chance at anything. 4’10? thats not too short so like wtf? theres tons of 4"10 ppl that prob have a better life than u and prob could get a job anywhere further than mcdonalds unlike u? recolour, yh i kno, but does it rlly fucking matter whether its a re colour or a model from scratch? either one ppl will have likes and dislikes, not all negative dislikes like u, seriously kid, get outside and go ask ur mom to bend over for u and ask if she feels anything and expect the obvious expected. now stfu and go crawl back to ur den plz? i dont want ur shit here just cause u spaz out over someone responding back to ur negativity.

hm and a shovel wow? go tie the rope and pay someone to kick your chair y dont u? fucking loser

Did he just say that 4’10’’ wasn’t short…

Hahahaha…

[/quote]

mhmmm were over it and if u read i believe it says “isnt too short” as 4"10 isnt THAT SHORT, i guess… iunno… lolz… im 5"12 so yh…

uhm if u guys want i can take the wings off idc, i just thought it was something to add as a bonus, 0.O my origanal plan was to have like spikes going down the spine[/quote]
K, please release w/o wings. And btw, if ur 5"12, you’re 6ft tall. Lol.

Read full topic
